item.title: EP 146 - The 8 Foot Tall Mummies Of Death Valley
item.itunes:title: The 8 Foot Tall Mummies Of Death Valley
item.description:
Today we play a haunted video game and then travel to Death Valley to try and unravel the mystery of a massive city buried beneath the sand.

“Fatal Frame” is a video game series that came out in the early 2000's. It was commercially and critically successful and you can still buy a copy today! Which is weird, since every copy is haunted!

Then we look at the sci-fi/thriller “Coherence” for Dead Rabbit Recommends.

And finally, we visit Death Valley. For nearly a hundred years, there have been rumors of a massive underground city seen by multiple witnesses. Is it possible there is the remnants of an ancient civilization of giants right beneath our feet?

 

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

https://bloody-disgusting.com/editorials/3496853/video-game-retrospective-fatal-frame-series-still-scariest/

https://kotaku.com/lets-rank-fatal-frame-best-to-worst-1650187922

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sEceDz1Rodc

http://www.holloworbs.com/death_valley.htm

https://www.thelivingmoon.com/43ancients/02files/Death_Valleys_Lost_City.html

https://www.amazon.com/Death-Valley-Men-Bourke-Lee/dp/B00085AAHK

 

Bottomless Pit in the Californian Desert

http://www.strangehistory.net/2016/09/05/bottomless-pit-californian-desert/

 

Devils Hole

http://lastadventurer.com/last-adventurers-fieldnotes/2012/9/27/devils-hole-death-valley-national-park

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable
